com.logtracking.lib.api

Class LogUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logtracking.lib.api.LogUtils

  • public class LogUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provide additional functionality to log standard system and runtime data. All messages has Log.INFO level.
    See Also:
    Log

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int logCallerClassAndMethod()
      Log info about caller class and method in format : Caller : Class = class Method = method Code line number = line Log message level - Log.INFO.
